pageSetting.title: 行员基数调整管理导入

column.name: sdbs
column.annotate: 填写序号： 1 时点 2 月日均 3 季日均 4 年日均 5 月累计 6 季累计 7 年累计 8 月平

column.name: bz
column.annotate: 填写序号： 01 人民币 0A 本外币折人民币 0B 外币折人民币 0C 外币折美元 FF 非币种

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjstzgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'调整起始日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMMdd!' where f_java_rule_date(t.qsrq,'yyyyMMdd')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjstzgldr_temp t set t.error=(select t.error||'起始日期不能小于(系统日期-重跑天数)'|| cast(f_change_days(cast(rq.csz as integer),-cast(cs.csz as integer )) as char(8))||'!' as error from xtb_xtcs rq ,xtb_xtcs cs where rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' and cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS') where cast(t.qsrq as integer)<(select f_change_days(cast(rq.csz as integer ),-cast(cs.csz as integer )) from xtb_xtcs rq ,xtb_xtcs cs where rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' and cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS') and (error='' or error is null) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjstzgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'调整后基数输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tzz)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.tzz,21,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjstzgldr_temp t set error=error||'此调整日期下，不存在此指标代号、时段标识、币种指定的行员' where not exists ( select 1 from yjzb_hykhjs hykhjs inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = hykhjs.khdxdh where t.hydh=hy.hydh and hykhjs.tjrq =cast(t.qsrq as integer) and hykhjs.zbdh = cast(t.zbdh as integer) and hykhjs.bz = t.bz and hykhjs.sdbs=t.sdbs ) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjstzgldr_temp t set error=error||'此统计日期下不存在此行员代号' where not exists ( select 1 from yjzb_hykhjs hykhjs inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=hykhjs.khdxdh where t.hydh=hy.hydh ) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjstzgldr_temp t set error=error||'此调整日期不存在此指标代号' where not exists ( select 1 from yjzb_hykhjs hykhjs where cast(t.zbdh as integer) = hykhjs.zbdh AND cast(t.qsrq as integer) = hykhjs.tjrq ) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjstzgldr_temp t set error=error||'此调整日期不存在此时段标识' where not exists ( select 1 from yjzb_hykhjs hykhjs where t.sdbs=hykhjs.sdbs and cast(t.qsrq as integer) = hykhjs.tjrq ) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjstzgldr_temp t set error=error||'此调整日期不存在此币种' where not exists ( select 1 from yjzb_hykhjs hykhjs where t.bz=hykhjs.bz and cast(t.qsrq as integer) = hykhjs.tjrq ) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjstzgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from YJZB_HYJSTZ tar ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(t.zbdh as INTEGER)=tar.ZBDH and t.bz =tar.BZ and t.sdbs =tar.SDBS and t.hydh=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and tar.QSRQ >= cast(t.qsrq as INTEGER) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyjstzgldr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select zbdh,bz,sdbs,hydh from hyjstzgldr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by zbdh,bz,sdbs,hydh having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.zbdh=dr.zbdh and t.bz=dr.bz and t.sdbs=dr.sdbs and t.hydh=dr.hydh) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE hyjstzgldr_temp ( qsrq varchar(100) , hydh varchar(100) , hymc varchar(100) , zbdh varchar(100) , zbmc varchar(100) , sdbs varchar(100) , bz varchar(100) , tzz varchar(100) , tzyy varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from hyjstzgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from hyjstzgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, qsrq,hydh,hymc,zbdh,zbmc,sdbs,bz,tzz,tzyy,khdxdh,error from hyjstzgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, qsrq,hydh,hymc,zbdh,zbmc,sdbs,bz,tzz,tzyy,khdxdh,error from hyjstzgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, qsrq,hydh,hymc,zbdh,zbmc,sdbs,bz,tzz,tzyy,khdxdh,error from hyjstzgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from YJZB_HYJSTZ tar where exists ( select 1 from $temp$ t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null or t.error ='数据已存在!') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and cast(t.zbdh as INTEGER)=tar.ZBDH and cast(t.bz as VARCHAR(3))=tar.BZ and cast(t.sdbs as VARCHAR(1))=tar.SDBS and cast(t.hydh as VARCHAR(20) )=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and tar.qsrq>= cast(t.qsrq as integer) )
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update YJZB_HYJSTZ tar set jsrq=(select F_Change_Days(cast(dr.qsrq as Integer),-1) from hyjstzgldr_temp dr,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(dr.zbdh as INTEGER)=tar.ZBDH and cast(dr.bz as VARCHAR(3))=tar.BZ and cast(dr.sdbs as VARCHAR(1))=tar.SDBS and cast(dr.hydh as VARCHAR(20) )=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and (length(dr.error)=0 or dr.error is null or dr.error='数据已存在!') and dr.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$) where exists( select 1 from hyjstzgldr_temp t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(t.zbdh as INTEGER)=tar.ZBDH and cast(t.bz as VARCHAR(3))=tar.BZ and cast(t.sdbs as VARCHAR(1))=tar.SDBS and cast(t.hydh as VARCHAR(20) )=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null or t.error='数据已存在!') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and tar.jsrq>=F_Change_Days(cast(t.qsrq as Integer),-1))
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update yjzb_hyjstz set jsrq = 29991231 where jsrq = (select distinct(nm) from csb_sjw sjw inner join hyjstzgldr_temp t on cast(t.qsrq as integer) = sjw.tjrq)
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into YJZB_HYJSTZ(ZBDH,BZ,SDBS,KHDXDH,QSRQ,JSRQ,TZZ,TZYY,CZR,CZSJ) select cast (t.zbdh as INTEGER), t.bz , t.sdbs ,KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH,cast (t.qsrq as INTEGER),CSB_SJW1.NM,cast (t.tzz as DECIMAL(25,4)), t.tzyy ,'$login_hydh$',F_GET_SYSTIME() from hyjstzgldr_temp t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0,CSB_SJW CSB_SJW1 where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and KHDX_HY0.HYDH=cast (t.hydh as VARCHAR(20)) and CSB_SJW1.TJRQ=cast (t.qsrq as INTEGER)
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update yjzb_hyjstz set jsrq = (select distinct(nm) from csb_sjw sjw inner join hyjstzgldr_temp t on cast(t.qsrq as integer) = sjw.tjrq) where jsrq = 29991231
